00016 def file2na( path ):
00017   f = open(path)
00018   lines = f.readlines()
00019   lines = [ l for l in lines if re.match("^Trial:", l) ]
00020   rows = len(lines)
00021   if rows < 1:
00022     print "No rows dummy!"
00023     sys.exit(1)
00024   cols = len(re.findall('[0-9.e+-]+',lines[1]))
00025   a = na.array( shape = ( rows, cols ), type = na.Float64 )
00026   for i in xrange( rows ):
00027     line = re.findall('[0-9.e+-]+',lines[i])
00028     if len(line) != cols:
00029       nline = [ '0.0' for j in xrange(cols) ]
00030       for c in xrange(len(line)):
00031         nline[c] = line[c]
00032       line = nline
00033     row = [ eval(s) for s in line ]
00034     a[ i ] = row
00035   return a
00036 
00037 if __name__ == "__main__":
00038   import sys
00039   import glob
00040   files = glob.glob(sys.argv[1])
00041   column_to_plot = 1 # begins with 1
00042   first_row_to_plot = 0 # to produce more detailed graphs... 15 for nac in sinus,
00043   i = 0
00044   b = na.zeros( shape = (1, len(files)), type = na.Float64 )
00045   for f in files:
00046     print f
00047     a = file2na( f )
00048     if i == 0:
00049       b = na.zeros( shape = (a.shape[0], len(files)), type = na.Float64 )
00050     b[:,i] += a[:,column_to_plot]
00051     i += 1
00052   last_row_to_plot = a.shape[0] # 25/30 for pg, 99 for nac
00053   print b.shape
00054   m = mlab.mean(b[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,:], 1)
00055   s = mlab.std(b[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,:], 1)
00056   min = mlab.min(b[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,:], 1)
00057   max = mlab.max(b[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,:], 1)
00058   if a[0,0] == 0.0:
00059     # Can't take log of 0. 
00060     a[0,0] = 1.0;
00061   
00062   lw = 2
00063   #pl.figure(figsize=(4, 3), dpi=300)
00064   pl.hold(True)
00065 
00066   pl.plot(a[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,0],m,'b-', label="Mean", linewidth=lw)
00067   pl.plot(a[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,0],m+s,'c--', label="Upper sdev.", linewidth=lw)
00068   pl.plot(a[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,0],m-s,'c--', label="Lower sdev.", linewidth=lw)
00069   pl.plot(a[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,0],min,'g:', label="Min", linewidth=lw)
00070   pl.plot(a[first_row_to_plot:last_row_to_plot,0],max,'r:', label="Max", linewidth=lw)
00071 
00072   pl.ylabel("R") # Reward / performance criteria
00073   pl.xlabel("Steps")
00074 
00075   #pl.axis([0,2000000,10,100])
00076   pl.legend(loc='lower right')
00077 
00078   pl.grid(True)
00079   pl.show()
